Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/31 2:47PM - Happy New Year's Eve! Flakes have been flying and the stoke goes higher than the summit as we ring in the New Year here at Stratton! 

Tonight is shaping up to be the perfect way to welcome the New Year! The Torchlight Parade begins at 8:30pm followed by our annual firework show! For the best viewing experience and to make sure you don't miss any of the action, secure your spot in the Main Base Area by 8:30pm. If youre looking for a one of a kind view of the show, join us for the Firework Hike to mid-mountain. The Family Buffet dinner in the Base Lodge as well as the 21+ Wild West party at Grizzlys are now sold out. If you missed out on tickets, there's plenty more options for aprs including Bar 802, Mulligans, and Green Door! Cant wait to see you there!

To kick off 2026, you'll find 59 ways down, all of which are set to receive fresh corduroy overnight. For your way up, we are planning on 12 lifts set to spin at 8:30am with the possibility of delays due to wind speeds picking up. Early access will be available for First Tracks pass holders. Snow showers are forecasted to continue through the evening and into New Years Day with 2-4 inches in the forecast so keep up those snow dances! Temperatures are expected to dip for tomorrow ranging from 1-5 degrees at the summit and 10-14 at the base. With cold temperatures and strong winds in the forecast, beginner skiing and riding is not recommended from the summit. Colder temperatures sticking around have allowed snowmaking and resurfacing operations to begin and will continue over the next several days as our team works to prepare the mountain for the New Year!

The park scene is coming to life with a 13-foot ramp Retro Halfpipe open and firing on East Byrnes Side, alongside 5 additional features to keep the laps rolling. Tyrolinne Park is also open with 6 features ready to ride.

Happy New Year and I'll see you in the morning for the first update of 2026! 

Safety Tip: Wear an extra layer and keep your face covered.

Holiday week is in full swing with extended dining hours, live music, and special events keeping the Village looking lively. Check out our Holiday Week Dining, Aprs & Live Music Guide to see what's open, happening, and where the music is at. Theres something for everyone this Holiday week and we couldnt be more excited to celebrate with you! Click here to check out the upcoming Events Calendar.

The Coca-Cola Tube Park is open! Reservations are recommended to save your spot while availability lasts. Tubing is available in 50 minute sessions starting at the top of each hour. Book now to secure your tickets! Please read the details and policies prior to purchasing your tickets. Hope to see you there!

Ice Skating is open! Lace up and head to the Mill House skating pond for a day or night of winter fun. Enjoy music and a campfire all while gliding under the stars. Book now to guarantee your place on the ice.

Guided Snowmobile Tours are up and running! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
